duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead electrical feature testing for specific vehicle programs and work with suppliers, Engineering Support teams, Program Management, and Manufacturing teams as required to validate and resolve electrical issues.
Create test plans for electrical features across the vehicle: cluster, radio, body control module, telematics, and powertrain.
Develop, maintain, and execute test plans (DVP&R) at the vehicle level and report defects based upon test plan failures.
Develop and maintain subsystem test benches and perform root cause analysis of issues found.
Provide feedback on System Requirements to ensure specs are testable.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Electrical, Computer Engineering or Computer Science
